events.message: I ordered a package two weeks ago, and it has not arrived yet. The tracking says it is delayed, and I am getting worried.
The customer's issue has been identified as a delivery delay based on the mention of late shipment and tracking problems.
A customer support agent from the delivery team has been assigned to handle this case regarding the delayed shipment.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your delayed package. Iâ€™m here to help resolve this issue as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the tracking code so that I can check the exact status of your shipment?
Sure, the order number is 123456789 and the tracking number is ABCDE12345. I appreciate your help with this.
After checking with the courier, it appears that your package was delayed due to weather disruptions. We expect delivery within 3 days and will monitor it closely.
Thank you for the update and the quick response. I understand the delay now, and I appreciate you monitoring the shipment.
We have marked your case as resolved since the delivery is expected soon. Please reach out again if the package does not arrive within the next three days.
Just checking in to confirm whether you have received your package now and if everything is satisfactory.
Yes, the package arrived today as expected. Thank you very much for your assistance and follow-up.
We are closing your case now. Please do not hesitate to contact us in the future for any assistance required.
We have sent you a short survey to gather feedback about your support experience. Your input helps us improve our service.
